markdownRemark.html:
Photo by Igor Miske on Unsplash

In this day and age, it seems everyone has a blog.

And there are many platforms that will help you build one.

If you wanted to set up a blog of your own style, and been looking for hosting it for free, you may have stumbled upon using GitHub Pages to serve your website.

The amazing people at GitHub present us with the option to serve our blog on their github.io domain. Letting us build that blog of our dreams.

For those new to it, GitHub pages

frontmatter.title: The From-scratch guide to building a static website with Gatsby
